-, center: Point2D, radius: float):%0A        self.center = center%0A        self.radius = radius%0A        self.name = %22Circ%22%0A%0A    def getName(self) -%3E str:%0A        return self.name%0A    %0A    def getArea(self) -%3E float:%0A        import math%0A        return math.pi * (self.radius ** 2)%0A    def getPerimeter(self) -%3E float:%0A        import math%0A        return 2 * math.pi * self.radius%0A    %0A    def __str__(self):%0A        return f%22Circ: C=%7Bself.center%7D, R=%7Bself.radius:.2f%7D%22%0A    %0Aclass Rectangle(Shape):%0A    def __init__(self, p1: Point2D, p2: Point2D):%0A        self.p1 = p1%0A        self.p2 = p2%0A        self.name = %22Rect%22%0A    %0A    def getName(self) -%3E str:%0A        return self.name%0A    %0A    def getArea(self) -%3E float:%0A        width = abs(self.p1.x - self.p2.x)%0A        height = abs(self.p1.y - self.p2.y)%0A        return width * height%0A    %0A    def getPerimeter(self) -%3E float:%0A        width = abs(self.p1.x - self.p2.x)%0A        height = abs(self.p1.y - self.p2.y)%0A        return  2 * (width + height)%0A%0A    def __str__(self):%0A        return f%22Rect: P1=%7Bself.p1%7D P2=%7Bself.p2%7D%22%0A    %0Adef main():%0A    shapes = %5B%5D%0A%0A    while True:%0A        line = input().split()%0A        if not line or line%5B0%5D == %22$end%22:%0A            break%0A%0A        cmd = line%5B0%5D%0A%0A        if cmd == %22$circle%22:%0A            x, y, r = map(float, line%5B1:%5D)%0A            shapes.append(Circle(Point2D(x, y), r))%0A%0A        elif cmd == %22$rect%22:%0A            x1, y1, x2, y2 = map(float, line%5B1:%5D)%0A            shapes.append(Rectangle(Point2D(x1, y1), Point2D(x2, y2)))%0A%0A        elif cmd == %22$show%22:%0A            for s in shapes:%0A                print(s)%0A        elif cmd == %22$info%22:%0A            for s in shapes:%0A                print(f%22%7Bs.getName()%7D: A=%7Bs.getArea():.2f%7D P=%7Bs.getPerimeter():.2f%7D%22)%0Aif __name__ == %22__main__%22:%0A    main()
